title: Can you get ban?
body: Here my question. Can you quite in the middle of the game when your teammates get toxic or blaming you ? Because in some of the game, you're doing good but they just blaming you. Like for example: our top lane can't stop other teammate top lane to come help out in bot lane. Our top lane blaming a sup score 1/5/16 a bad sup and toxic it out. Blaming teammates. At this points i just wanted to quite the game and start a new one. But can you get ban from afk in the middle of the game since you don't want to die anymore and get reported for international feeding >?

replies.body: Leaving game/AFK.  <--- That's the report you get if you do

It's never okay to AFK out of a game.

If your teammates are flaming, you gotta mute them. Report them if you want.

> Technically going AFK is unsportsmanlike behavior, so it could possibly lead to a future ban, yes.

This babe is right. I'm not sure if they give you account suspensions for going AFK but Leavebuster will detect it and eventually give you a Low Priority Queue if you keep going AFK. I recommend you mute them and try your best to communicate via pings OP.
well no choice but to agree with you all... thanks all of you guys. good response.
